game.name: Amazing Frog?
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Amazing Frog? is an openworld, sandbox, physics game. Grand Frog Auto in Swindon, with farting ragdoll frogs.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Amazing Frog? is an openworld, sandbox, physics game. Grand Frog Auto in Swindon, with farting ragdoll frogs.

reviewHighlights.text: The game has a great premise, but the fact you cant rebind keys and cant save your progress really drags the whole experience down.
awesome game with consistent updates and the ability of splitscreen makes it so much better
